availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Bennett Burnam (Warren County, Kentucky, surveyor and soldier.)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, surveyor and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John Burnam and America Burnam. Attended school in Warren County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned ten enslaved persons in Warren County in 1850. Attended Georgetown College in Georgetown, Scott County, Kentucky, in 1853. Surveyor in Warren County in 1860. Household owned twenty-one enslaved persons in Warren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
